intro: Tutcheria kweichowensis, commonly known as the Yunnan tutcheria, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Yunnan Province in China. The plant is characterized by its upright growth habit and clusters of small, pinkish-white flowers that bloom in late spring. Tutcheria kweichowensis is often found in moist, shaded environments and is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited distribution.
